original_text:
Book of Gods
In questa slot della maltese BF Games, il tema principale è il mondo egizio. Sì, lo so cosa stai pensando: l’ennesima slot ambientata sulle sponde del Nilo. Ciò che distingue però Book of Gods da tutte le altre slot simili è senza dubbio la grafica iper-ricercata e il gameplay senza fronzoli tutto improntato sulla dinamicità e sull’azione. Il protagonista del gioco è un esploratore che ricorda Indiana Jones, alla ricerca di un misterioso libro nascosto nel palazzo del faraone. E proprio il libro magico è il simbolo cardine della slot, ma questo lo vedremo a breve. Per ora ci basterà sapere che la grafica di Book of Gods è superlativa, con i simboli cari agli egizi riprodotti con precisione maniacale. Anche il tema musicale si sposa appieno con il resto del gioco, aumentando l’adrenalina che accompagna ogni spin.
La pulsantiera è molto intuitiva, con pochi tasti per settare al meglio la giocata e dare avvio agli spin.
Caratteristiche della slot
La griglia dal taglio classico ha 5 rulli, 3 righe e 10 linee di pagamento fisse. Si vince associando simboli identici adiacenti da sinistra a destra. Nel caso di più combinazioni su una stessa linea ci vedremo assegnata solo la vincita maggiore, se invece le combinazioni avvengono su diverse linee, allora gli importi saranno sommati. La puntata minima è di 0,01 € per linea, con ogni giro che ci costerà soltanto 0,10 €. I giri automatici attivabili sono compresi tra 10 e 100 e si bloccano soltanto al raggiungimento di una perdita soglia che decidiamo prima di scegliere il numero di giri da attivare.
Il valore RTP è pari al 96,12%.
Simboli e funzionalità
In Book of Gods ci sono diversi simboli, alcuni a tema egizio e altri no. Quelli che valgono meno sono le carte da gioco dal dieci all’asso, a seguire troviamo lo scarabeo e il dio Anubi, poi il sarcofago di Tutankhamon e l’esploratore.
Il simbolo speciale è il libro magico in oro massiccio con al centro l’occhio di Horus. Esso, oltre ad essere pagante (ha lo stesso valore di Tutankhamon), ha funzione di Wild e di Scatter. nel primo caso sostituisce tutti i simboli in una combinazione vincente, nel secondo caso con 3 simboli in qualsiasi punto della griglia ci ricompensa con 10 Free Spins. Durante i giri bonus, un simbolo Extra Scatter rappresentato da un libro aperto può regalarci dieci ulteriori Free Spins.
In Book of Gods è presente anche la funzione Gamble, che ci permette di raddoppiare la somma vinta o di perderla completamente.

raw_translation.response:
Book of Gods:
In this slot game developed by the Maltese company BF Games, the main theme is the world of Ancient Egypt. Yes, we know what you're thinking: another slot set along the banks of the Nile. However, what sets Book of Gods apart from all other similar slots is undoubtedly its hyper-sophisticated graphics and its straightforward gameplay, focused on dynamism and action. The protagonist of the game is an explorer reminiscent of Indiana Jones, in search of a mysterious book hidden in the Pharaoh's palace. And it's precisely the magic book that is the cornerstone of the slot, but we'll get to that shortly. For now, let's just say that the graphics in Book of Gods are outstanding, with symbols dear to the Egyptians reproduced with maniacal precision. The musical theme also fully complements the rest of the game, increasing the adrenaline that accompanies each spin.

The control panel is very intuitive, with few buttons to set the game to the best advantage and start the spins. 

Features of the slot:
The classic grid has 5 reels, 3 rows, and 10 fixed paylines. To win, you need to match adjacent identical symbols from left to right. In the case of multiple combinations on the same line, we'll only be assigned the highest payout, while if the combinations happen on different lines, the amounts will be added up. The minimum bet is €0.01 per line, and each spin will cost us only €0.10. The automatic spins that can be activated are between 10 and 100 and stop only when we reach a predetermined loss threshold before choosing the number of spins to activate. The RTP value is equal to 96.12%.

Symbols and features:
In Book of Gods, there are different symbols, some Egyptian-themed, and others not. The lower-paying ones are the playing cards from ten to ace, followed by the scarab and the god Anubis, then the sarcophagus of Tutankhamun, and the explorer. The special symbol is the solid gold magic book with the Eye of Horus in the center. Besides being a paying symbol (it has the same value as Tutankhamun), it works as a Wild and Scatter. In the first case, it replaces all symbols in a winning combination, and in the second case, with 3 symbols in any position on the grid, it rewards us with 10 Free Spins. During the bonus spins, an Extra Scatter symbol represented by an open book can give us ten additional Free Spins. In Book of Gods, there is also the Gamble feature, which allows us to double the amount won or lose it completely.

Review:
 
Gameplay and Graphics

Book of Gods, developed by BF Games, is set in the world of Ancient Egypt. The graphics in the game are sophisticated and offer outstanding visuals. The game's protagonist is an explorer who has a striking resemblance to Indiana Jones and is in pursuit of a book hidden in the Pharaoh's palace. The game's musical theme complements the graphics and increases the excitement of each spin. The control panel is user-friendly, requiring minimal effort to set up and begin spinning.

Symbols and Paylines

The slot game Book of Gods features a standard grid with 5 reels, 3 rows, and 10 fixed paylines. Winning combinations occur when identical symbols appear on adjacent reels from left to right. The playing cards from ten to ace are the lower-paying symbols, followed by the scarab and the god Anubis, the sarcophagus of Tutankhamun, and the explorer. The magic book is the special symbol in the game and serves as both a Wild and Scatter. It replaces all symbols and rewards players with 10 Free Spins when three symbols appear anywhere on the grid. The value of the magic book is the same as the value of Tutankhamun. During the bonus spins, an Extra Scatter symbol, an open book, can reward players with ten additional Free Spins.  

Special Features

Book of Gods has several special features that increase players' chances of winning. These include the magic book symbol, which acts as both a Wild and Scatter, the Extra Scatter symbol that can reward players with additional Free Spins, and the Gamble feature, which allows players to double their winnings or lose them entirely. The Free Spins feature is the game's highlight, allowing players to maximize wins and improve their overall gaming experience. 

Betting Options

Book of Gods has a minimum bet of €0.01 per line and a maximum bet of €50 per spin. Players can activate automatic spins that range from 10 to 100, which stop when the predetermined loss threshold is reached. Before activating the automatic spins, players can choose the number of spins they want to activate. The betting options in the game are flexible and cater to all levels of players' bankrolls. 

RTP Value

The RTP value of Book of Gods is 96.12%, which is competitive with other popular slot games. The game's RTP value ensures that players have a fair chance of winning and earning payouts during their gaming experience.

The minimum bet is €0.01 per line, and each spin will cost us only €0.10. The automatic spins that can be activated are between 10 and 100 and stop only when we reach a predetermined loss threshold before choosing the number of spins to activate. The RTP value is equal to 96.12%.

Symbols and features:
In Book of Gods, there are different symbols, some Egyptian-themed, and others not. The lower-paying ones are the playing cards from ten to ace, followed by the scarab and the god Anubis, then the sarcophagus of Tutankhamun, and the explorer. The special symbol is the solid gold magic book with the Eye of Horus in the center. Besides being a paying symbol (it has the same value as Tutankhamun), it works as a Wild and Scatter.
